stepTitle: The function A(d) gives the pain level on a scale of $$0$$ to $$10$$ experienced by a patient with $$d$$ milligrams of a pain-reducing drug in her system. The milligrams of the drug in the patient's system after $$t$$ minutes is modeled by m(t). Which of the following would you do in order to determine when the patient will be at a pain level of 4?
